headline: Sizing Up Norfolk Southern (NSC) Valuation After A Strong One Year Run
summary: Sizing up Norfolk Southern after a strong 1 year run Norfolk Southern (NSC) has drawn fresh attention after a strong stretch in its share price, including a 25.5% total return over the past year and double digit gains in recent months. With the stock last closing at US$315.45, investors are weighing that performance against the company’s fundamentals. These include US$12.18b in revenue, US$2.87b in net income, and a value score of 2. See our latest analysis for Norfolk Southern. Recent...
